game.name: Mix and match
game.shortDescription: Drag the picture into the right box to tidy up the room

game.name: Pelmanism
game.shortDescription: Match pairs of cards by naming pictures - clear the board to reveal the hidden image

game.name: Four in row
game.shortDescription: Win 4 cells in a row by choosing the right language from a list

game.name: Hang the man
game.shortDescription: Work out the word or phrase by guessing letters before the character is hanged

game.name: The frog flies
game.shortDescription: Move the frog to catch the flies before the bird catches you

game.name: Spelling game
game.shortDescription: Choose the text that has the right spelling from a choice of similar options
